issue.title: [CF 173] Meta icon enhancements
issue.body:
• Show the texture of each selected icon next to its dropdown in the meta editor
  • Add a scrollbar to the meta editor incase you have a lot of icons being shown (currently they just extend underneath the editor and interfere with the stuff at the bottom)

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #173 | Raw

comments.body:
Yeah that would be nice, another thing you could add is to allow us to give meta icons an icon image of our choosing, it would help us when we're using sub-metas to tell each meta icon apart.

Edited Apr 18, 2011

> Posted by CurseForge user Beruchan
